players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie, I think Alice is the mafia because they were investigated by me last night and are now acting suspiciously."
You: "I have nothing to hide, I trust everyone in this game."
Diana: "I think we should lynch Alice."
You: "I have nothing to hide and I trust everyone in this game. Let's focus on finding the real mafia among us instead of making baseless accusations."
